content:
In the research phase:

Research Phase:
Desk Research: Study existing interactive exhibits, gather information about the Naturalis Museum and its dinosaur collection.
Context Mapping: Create a visual representation of the museum environment and user interactions.
User Research: Conduct interviews, observations, and surveys with young visitors at the museum to understand their needs and preferences.
I Want to do field research (going to other museums to get an insight into how they tackle things)
